backend/main.mo: Actor defines an Inquiry type and stores submitted inquiries in a list with validation and timestamping.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short summaries of their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags, loading Inter font, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in a React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form component with validation, success/error states, and backend submission via useSubmitInquiry.
frontend/src/components/CourseSection.ts: Displays course info with benefits list and CTA buttons linking to contact, phone, and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Feature display card with icon, title, description, and hover styling.
frontend/src/components/GoogleMapEmbed.t: Lazyâ€‘loads a Google Maps iframe when scrolled into view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSection: Simple wrapper component providing consistent section spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with logo, quick links, contact info, and social media buttons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, desktop navigation, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, main content area, and a sticky WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/StickyWhatsAppBu: Floating WhatsApp action button linking to a predefined chat URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Mutation hook to submit contact inquiries via the backend actor and refresh inquiry data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theming variables, global styles, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/lib/contactLinks.ts: Utility functions generating tel, WhatsApp, and email links using predefined contact info.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Simple helper for updating the document title and meta description.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, query client, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page with meta tags and multiple marketing sections describing mission, vision, and methodology.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with meta tags, contact details, form, and an embedded Google Map.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Renders the courses page with SEO metadata, marketing sections, and detailed course offerings for board and competitive exams.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, SEO metadata, promotional sections, and feature highlights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata and requests, including a pending feature to add social media buttons to the footer.
